original_text: According to the custom of the priest's office, his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord.
korean_text: 제사장의 전례를 따라 제비를 뽑아 주의 성전에 들어가 분향하고

sentences.original_text: According to the custom of the priest's office,
his lot was to burn incense
when he went into the temple of the Lord.
